Statements.Statement: select * from MappingServiceELab_His
select * from LabPatient where PatientCode = @PatientCode
select * from LabPatient
select * from CLSYeuCau
select * from CLSYeuCauChiTiet

insert into LabPatient ( HospitalCode , PatientCode , IssueDate , PatientName , FirstName , LastName , DOB , YOB , Address , Sex , PatientID_His , CreatedDate , CreatedBy , ModifiedDate , ModifiedBy ) values ( @HospitalCode , @PatientCode , @IssueDate , @PatientName , @FirstName , @LastName , @DOB , @YOB , @Address , @Sex , @PatientID_His , @CreatedDate , @CreatedBy , @ModifiedDate , @ModifiedBy ) SELECT CAST(SCOPE_IDENTITY() as int);

update LabPatient set IssueDate = @IssueDate , PatientName = @PatientName , FirstName = @FirstName , LastName = @LastName , DOB = @DOB , YOB = @YOB , Address = @Address , Sex = @Sex , PatientID_His = @PatientID_His where PatientCode = @PatientCode
select * from CLSYeuCau where DVYeuCau_Id_His = @DVYeuCau_Id_His
select * from CLSYeuCauChiTiet where CLSYeuCau_Id = @CLSYeuCau_Id

insert into CLSYeuCau ( SoPhieuYeuCau , NgayYeuCau , ThoiGianYeuCau , BacSiChiDinh_Id , NoiThucHien_Id , BenhNhan_Id , DVYeuCau_Id_His , DichVu_Id ) values ( @SoPhieuYeuCau , @NgayYeuCau , @ThoiGianYeuCau , @BacSiChiDinh_Id , @NoiThucHien_Id , @BenhNhan_Id , @DVYeuCau_Id_His , @DichVu_Id ) SELECT CAST(SCOPE_IDENTITY() as int);

update CLSYeuCau set SoPhieuYeuCau = @SoPhieuYeuCau , NgayYeuCau = @NgayYeuCau , ThoiGianYeuCau = @ThoiGianYeuCau , BacSiChiDinh_Id = @BacSiChiDinh_Id , NoiThucHien_Id = @NoiThucHien_Id , BenhNhan_Id = @BenhNhan_Id , DichVu_Id = @DichVu_Id where DVYeuCau_Id_His = @DVYeuCau_Id_His
update CLSYeuCauChiTiet set CLSYeuCau_Id = @CLSYeuCau_Id , DichVu_Id = @DichVu_Id where YeuCauChiTiet_Id = @YeuCauChiTiet_Id

Insert into DIC_Employee ( Employee_ID , EmployeeCode , EmployeeName , DepartmentID , Sex , DOB , Address , Nationality , CreatedDate , ModifiedDate ) values ( @Employee_ID , @EmployeeCode , @EmployeeName , @DepartmentID , @Sex , @DOB , @Address , @Nationality , @CreatedDate , @ModifiedDate )
select * from DIC_Employee

SET IDENTITY_INSERT [dbo].[DIC_Employee] ON BEGIN TRANSACTION; declare @JSON nvarchar(max) = N'' + @DATA + '' Insert into DIC_Employee (Employee_ID, EmployeeCode, EmployeeName, DepartmentID, Address, Nationality, Enabled) select Employee_ID, EmployeeCode, EmployeeName, DepartmentID, Address, Nationality, Enabled from OPENJSON(@JSON) WITH ( Employee_ID int , EmployeeCode varchar(20) , EmployeeName nvarchar(500) , DepartmentID int , Address nvarchar(500) , Nationality nvarchar(200) , Enabled bit ) COMMIT; SET IDENTITY_INSERT [dbo].[DIC_Employee] OFF

BEGIN TRANSACTION; declare @JSON nvarchar(max) = N'' + @DATA + '' update DIC_Employee set EmployeeCode = json.EmployeeCode , EmployeeName = json.EmployeeName , DepartmentID = json.DepartmentID , Address = json.Address , Nationality = json.Nationality , Enabled = json.Enabled from OPENJSON(@JSON) with ( EmployeeCode varchar(20) , EmployeeName nvarchar(500) , DepartmentID int , Address nvarchar(500) , Nationality nvarchar(200) , Enabled bit ) json where DIC_Employee.EmployeeCode = json.EmployeeCode COMMIT;
select * from DIC_Department

SET IDENTITY_INSERT [dbo].[DIC_Department] ON BEGIN TRANSACTION; declare @JSON nvarchar(max) = N'' + @JSON_DATA + ''; Insert into DIC_Department (DepartmentID, DepartmentCode, DepartmentName, Level, ParentID, IsMadeServices, Enabled) select DepartmentID, DepartmentCode, DepartmentName, Level, ParentID, IsMadeServices, Enabled from OPENJSON(@JSON) WITH ( DepartmentID int , DepartmentCode varchar(20) , DepartmentName nvarchar(500) , Level int , ParentID int , IsMadeServices bit , Enabled bit ) COMMIT; SET IDENTITY_INSERT [dbo].[DIC_Department] OFF

BEGIN TRANSACTION; declare @JSON nvarchar(max) = N'' + @JSON_DATA + ''; Update DIC_Department set DepartmentCode = json.DepartmentCode , DepartmentName = json.DepartmentName , Level = json.Level , ParentID = json.ParentID , IsMadeServices = json.IsMadeServices , Enabled = json.Enabled from OPENJSON(@JSON) with ( DepartmentCode varchar(20) , DepartmentName nvarchar(500) , Level int , ParentID int , IsMadeServices bit , Enabled bit ) json where DIC_Department.DepartmentCode = json.DepartmentCode COMMIT;
select * from DIC_PatientType
select * from LabPatient
